00036 #import "RCUploadRequest.h"
00037 #import "RCRequest+Protected.h"
00038 
00039 
00040 @implementation RCUploadRequest
00041 
00042 @synthesize fileToUploadURL=fileToUploadURL_;
00043 
00044 - (void) configureURLRequest:(NSMutableURLRequest *)URLRequest {
00045         [super configureURLRequest:URLRequest];
00046         
00047         NSFileManager *fm = [[NSFileManager alloc] init];
00048         
00049         if (NO == [fm fileExistsAtPath:[self.fileToUploadURL  path]]) {
00050                 NSDictionary *info = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObject:[self.fileToUploadURL path] forKey:NSFilePathErrorKey];
00051                 NSError *missingFileError = [NSError errorWithDomain:NSCocoaErrorDomain code:NSFileNoSuchFileError userInfo:info];
00052                 self.error = missingFileError;
00053                 [self abort];
00054                 return;
00055         }
00056         
00057         NSError *readError = nil;
00058         NSDictionary *attributes = [fm attributesOfItemAtPath:[self.fileToUploadURL path] error:&readError];
00059         if (nil == attributes) {
00060                 self.error = readError;
00061                 [self abort];
00062         }
00063         
00064         // Set up body stream and content length
00065         
00066         self.bodyContentLength = [attributes fileSize];         
00067         URLRequest.HTTPBodyStream = [NSInputStream inputStreamWithURL:self.fileToUploadURL];
00068         [URLRequest setValue:[[NSNumber numberWithLongLong:[attributes fileSize]] stringValue] forHTTPHeaderField:@"Content-Length"];
00069         
00070         // Get the mime-type from UTI
00071         
00072     CFStringRef UTI = UTTypeCreatePreferredIdentifierForTag(kUTTagClassFilenameExtension, (__bridge CFStringRef)[[self.fileToUploadURL path] pathExtension], NULL);
00073     NSString *MIMEType = (__bridge_transfer NSString *)UTTypeCopyPreferredTagWithClass(UTI, kUTTagClassMIMEType);
00074     CFRelease(UTI);
00075 
00076     if (nil == MIMEType) {
00077         MIMEType = @"text/plain";
00078     }
00079         [URLRequest setValue:MIMEType forHTTPHeaderField:@"Content-Type"];
00080 }
00081 
00082 // ========================================================================== //
00083 
00084 #pragma mark - NSURLConnectionDataDelegate
00085 
00086 
00087 
00088 - (NSInputStream *)connection:(NSURLConnection *)connection needNewBodyStream:(NSURLRequest *)request {
00089         return [NSInputStream inputStreamWithURL:self.fileToUploadURL];
00090 }
00091 
00092 - (void)connection:(NSURLConnection *)connection didSendBodyData:(NSInteger)bytesWritten totalBytesWritten:(NSInteger)totalBytesWritten totalBytesExpectedToWrite:(NSInteger)totalBytesExpectedToWrite {
00093         self.sentContentLength = totalBytesWritten;
00094         
00095         [self connectionDidSendDataHandler];
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 @end
